text: Samson ga helekai gi digaula, “Au ga hagi adu dahi ala mee e dongo go goodou. Maa tei goodou guu dongo di maa i mua nia laangi e hidu o tagamiami, gei au gaa wanga gi tangada nei mo tangada nei i goodou dahi gahu lenge humalia mo tei bida gahu humalia. Gei maa goodou digi dongo di maa i mua nia laangi e hidu o tagamiami, gei goodou gaamai gi di au nia mee labelaa beelaa.”
